content.title: Lucky for those women who have perfectly clean skin by nature. But most of us from time to time have to deal with isolated pimples that appear from improper diet or skin care, with allergies. In our material, we will tell you how to quickly remove a pimple from your face.

content.text: You should not crush pimples . From this they will become even more noticeable. Regular aspirin will help. Do this: crush the pill, fill it with water, apply the resulting gruel to the pimple. It is best to leave the mixture on your face overnight.

An alternative method is regular toothpaste, which is simply applied to the pimple at night. It is only important that it contains a minimum of chemistry. Ideally, the toothpaste for getting rid of skin imperfections is organic.
An alternative can be salicylic or zinc paste. From folk remedies, tea tree oil helps well due to its anti-inflammatory and antimicrobial properties. It is called a naturally occurring antibiotic.

But it's best to take simple precautions before using them. Place one drop of essential oil on your wrist and wait 10-15 minutes. Evaluate the result. If you see a small rash, you are allergic to this oil and should not be used. Similar reactions are common with essential oils.
We also recommend purchasing Levomekol ointment. It contains the antibiotic Levomycetin. If you lubricate a pimple with this tool at night, in the morning there will be almost no trace of it.

content.perechen: wash the affected area with mild soap and warm water and pat dry
Dampen a cotton ball or pad with the ointment and apply to the pimple.

content.text: If you do not want to use chemicals, honey will be beneficial for getting rid of acne. If you are not allergic, apply it on the inflamed skin for 10-20 minutes. It is better to use not store-bought honey, but bought at an apiary.
Prepare a mask from milk and white clay, add honey to it. It is enough to keep it on the skin for half an hour. Take all components in equal parts.
Compresses with sea salt have a good effect. It is enough to apply them for a couple of minutes to the inflamed area for 2-3 days.

content.title: Ice is an assistant in the fight against acne

content.text: If the pimple is sore, red, and painful, apply an ice pack to it for no more than ten minutes. Wrap the ice in a thin cloth, do not apply it to your skin. You can get frostbite.

Be careful when accepting facial cleansing procedures such as microdermabrasion or exfoliation. It is better if they are done by a dermatologist, not a cosmetologist. Go to specialized clinics for these procedures. The nearest salon near the house may not be suitable. And consider the season: most procedures, except for superficial peels, are not done in summer. This is due to the fact that the skin after them is too sensitive to ultraviolet light.
